ALL USERS: Required reading!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2006 Topics (Year of the Mercury Drop): ALL USERS: Required reading!
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, August 15, 2006 - 08:52 pm:

I have been getting several account requests a day from people born in 1992 who are submitting unacceptable applications. It's pretty clear that someone is telling them what to submit, and allowing them to bypass reading the Office of the Mayor because they submit 4-5 items but these items are wildly unacceptable.

I would like to remind everyone that helping people get accounts in such a manner is a direct violation of site policy and will result in immediate banning from the site.

I have wasted 45 minutes tonight, last night, the night before and done the same on at least three nights last week. I am tired of it. If it doesn't stop, I will be forced to suspend new memberships because it's become a huge waste of time for me.
